issue.title: [Packaging][deb] Rename -archive-keyring to -apt-source
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12353](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12353). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because lintian recommends that a package that puts files to
/etc/apt/sources.list.d/ uses -apt-source suffix.

See also: https://lintian.debian.net/tags/package-installs-apt-sources

This also changes repository URL to
https://apache.jfrog.io/artifactory/ from https://apache.bintray.com/ .
